articles.title: Distributed Spatial Analysis with Uber H3 and PySpark
articles.excerpt: Building a scalable geospatial data lake on AWS to analyze economic resilience across Mexico using hierarchical spatial indexing and distributed computing.

articles.title: Building Reproducible ML Pipelines with Kedro and MLflow
articles.excerpt: A practical guide to engineering modular time series forecasting pipelines with experiment tracking, versioning, and containerization for production deployment.

articles.title: Fine-tuning GPT-4 for Government Applications
articles.excerpt: How we fine-tuned GPT-4o Mini to automate public fund allocation scoring, achieving 0.75 F1 score on unstructured Excel data extraction.

articles.title: Detecting Gravitational Waves with Topological Data Analysis
articles.excerpt: Using Takens Embedding and persistent homology to extract topological features for CNN-based gravitational wave signal detection.

articles.title: Solving the Orienteering Problem with Time Windows
articles.excerpt: A deep dive into formulating and solving multi-objective route optimization problems using GAMS and real-world geospatial constraints.

articles.title: High-Performance RNA Structure Analysis with SLURM
articles.excerpt: Engineering scalable bioinformatics pipelines on HPC clusters to process thousands of RNA structures using graph isomorphism algorithms.
